name: Andromeda Space Shooter
description:
Andromeda Space Shooter is an intense action packed space game with non-stop explosive action.
Blast your way through deadly asteroids fields and alien war ships. Collect crystals and weapon upgrades. Andromeda Space Shooter is the most entertaining and addictive version of one of the greatest arcade shooter in space history!

Features:
• Dozens of levels and unlimited survival mode
• Bright colorful graphics style and special effects
• Easy touch control
• Professional electronic soundtrack by award winning composer
• High quality sound effects
...and many more!

Enjoy the action!
